display_name: Inhibitors Of Adenosine Diphosphate (ADP)-Induced Platelet Aggregation (Sleep Heart Health Study Visit Two (SHHS2))
description: Participant taking INHIBITORS OF Adenosine Diphosphate (ADP)-INDUCED PLATELET AGGREGATION within two weeks of the Sleep Heart Health Study Visit Two (SHHS2) visit.  All medications were recorded during the interview, and medication information was later categorized by physician review.
